<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR>
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" VALIGN="TOP">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Silicom Ltd. and its Subsidiaries
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Notes to the Consolidated Financial Statements
</FONT>
</FONT>
<DIV>
<HR STYLE="COLOR: BLACK" ALIGN="LEFT" NOSHADE SIZE="1" WIDTH="100%">
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Note 15 - Subsequent Events
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: -36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 36PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 36PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	On March 21, 2016 Silicom's Board of Directors declared a dividend of US $1.00 per share payable on April 14, 2016 to shareholders of record as of April 4, 2016, and in the aggregate amount of approximately US $7.3 million for 2015.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 36PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	In March 2016, the Company&#8217;s compensation committee and board of directors, respectively, have approved the grant of a total of 97,078 options under the Global Share Incentive Plan (2013), of which options granted to directors and office holders are subject to the approval of the Annual General Meeting, which is currently scheduled to convene no later than June 2016, as prescribed under the Israeli Companies Law, 1999 and the Company's Amended and Restated Articles of Association.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 36PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV ID="PGBRK" STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
	F - 41
</DIV>

<HR STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: -5PX; COLOR: #000000" NOSHADE SIZE="1">
<HR STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: -13PX; COLOR: #000000" NOSHADE SIZE="4">

<A NAME="EXHIBIT_4-7_HTM_A1">
	SE

	AGREEMENT
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	THIS ASSET PURCHASE AGREEMENT (this &#8220;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Agreement
</FONT>
	&#8221;) is made and entered into as of September 30, 2015 by and among Silicom, Ltd., a company incorporated in Israel (directly and/or through its Affiliate Silicom Connectivity Solutions, Inc. (&#8220;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Silicom Inc.
</FONT>
	&#8221;), a company incorporated in the State of Washington, having&#160;its principal place of business in the State of New Jersey) (collectively, the &#8220;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Purchaser
</FONT>
	&#8221;), ADI Engineering, Inc., a company incorporated in the Commonwealth of Virginia (&#8220;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Seller
</FONT>
	&#8221;) and the shareholders of the Seller Mr. Steve Yates and Mrs. Patricia Yates
<FONT STYLE="FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#160;
</FONT>
	(each a &#8220;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Selling Shareholder
</FONT>
	&#8221; and, collectively, the &#8220;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Selling Shareholders
</FONT>
	&#8221;). The Purchaser, Seller and the Selling Shareholders are referred to individually as a &#8220;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Party
</FONT>
	&#8221; and collectively herein as the &#8220;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Parties
</FONT>
	.&#8221;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="CENTER">

	A.
</FONT>

	NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the foregoing premises, and the representations, warranties, covenants and agreements set forth herein, and for other good and valuable consideration, the receipt and legal sufficiency of which are hereby acknowledged and accepted, and intending to be legally bound hereby, the Parties agree as follows:

<DIV ID="HDR">
<DIV ID="GLHDR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.5&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#8220;2017 Excess Payment&#8221;
</FONT>
	shall have the meaning ascribed to such term in Section
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#8206;
</FONT>
	2.2(b)(iii).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 446PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.6&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#8220;Acquisition
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Transaction&#8221;
</FONT>
	means any transaction or series of transactions involving:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 72PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	(a)
</FONT>
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;the sale, license or disposition of all or a material portion of the Seller&#8217;s or its Affiliate&#8217;s business, properties, assets or share capital;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 72PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	(b)
</FONT>
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;the issuance, disposition or acquisition of: (i) any shares or other equity security of the Seller or its Affiliates, (ii) any other right to acquire any securities of Seller or its Affiliates, or (iii) any instrument or obligation that is or may become convertible into or exchangeable for any securities of Seller or its Affiliates;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 72PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	(c)
</FONT>
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;any merger, consolidation, business combination, reorganization or similar transaction involving Seller or its Affiliates; or
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 72PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	(d)
</FONT>
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;any engagement of all or substantially all of the employees, consultants and contractors of Seller or its Affiliates; or
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 72PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	(e)
</FONT>
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;any joint venture or other strategic investment in or involving Seller or its Affiliates (other than an ongoing commercial or strategic relationship in the Ordinary Course of Business).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.7&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#8220;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Affiliate
</FONT>
	&#8221; of any Person means any Person that controls, is controlled by, or is under common control with such Person. As used herein, the term &#8220;control&#8221; (including the terms &#8220;controlling&#8221;, &#8220;controlled by&#8221; and &#8220;under common control with&#8221;) means the possession, directly or indirectly, of the power to direct or cause the direction of the management and policies of a Person, whether through ownership of voting securities or other interests, by contract or otherwise.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>

<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_38"></A>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.8&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#160;&#160;&#160;&#8220;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Agreement
</FONT>
	&#8221; shall have the meaning ascribed to such term in the Preamble.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.9&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#160;&#160;&#8220;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Assumed Liabilities
</FONT>
	&#8221; shall have the meaning ascribed to such term in
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	Section&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	&#8206;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	2.4(c)
</FONT>
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.10&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#160;&#160;&#8220;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Business
</FONT>
	&#8221; means the business of designing, manufacturing and selling specialty design services, and standard and custom circuit boards and box-build products, which incorporate hardware and/or software, and are optimized to specific markets and applications.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">

</FONT>
	&#8221; shall have the meaning ascribed to such term in
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.12&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#8220;Business Day&#8221;
</FONT>
	means any day other than a Friday, Saturday or a Sunday or a day on which the banking institutions in the United States or Israel are authorized by Legal Requirement to close.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.13&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#160;&#8220;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Business Contracts
</FONT>
	&#8221; means all contracts which are currently in force or pursuant to which any Person has or may have an effective right or obligation: (a) to which the Seller is a party; (b) by which the Seller or its assets is or may become bound or under which the Seller has, or may become subject to, any obligation; or (c) under which the Seller has or may acquire any right or interest, that are in effect and related to the Business, which contracts are listed on
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	Schedule
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	&#8206;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	1.13
</FONT>
	.&#160;&#160;For purposes hereof, the term &#8220;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Business Contracts
</FONT>
	&#8221; shall not include (A) the Transferred Employee Contracts, (B) Seller IP Contracts, or (C) the Leases;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">

	1.14&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#8220;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">

</FONT>
	&#8221; means the employees and consultants of the Seller who are primarily engaged in the Business, which employees and consultants are listed (name and title) on
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	Schedule&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	&#8206;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	1.14
</FONT>
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.15&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#8220;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Business Records
</FONT>
	&#8221; means all books, records, ledgers and files or other similar information of the Seller used or held for use in the operation or conduct of the Business, including organizational documents, minute books, share registers, Tax and accounting records, filings with any Governmental Body, price lists, customer lists, mailing lists, warranty information, catalogs, sales promotion literature, advertising materials, brochures, standard forms of documents, research materials and product testing reports required by any Governmental Body.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.16&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#8220;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Business Tangible Personal Property
</FONT>
	&#8221; means all tangible personal property, including all machinery, equipment and tools, furniture and furnishings, computers and computer supplies, office materials and supplies, primarily used or held for use by the Seller in the Business as of the Closing, wherever located (including at the Premises, at the homes of Business Employees or otherwise), and all personal productivity assets owned by the Seller associated with Business Employees such as personal data assistants, cellular phones and personal computers, but excluding the Business Records.&#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	Schedule
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	&#8206;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	1.16
</FONT>
	lists each item of the Business Tangible Personal Property.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.17&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#8220;Carve-Out Statements of Operations&#8221;
</FONT>
	means the carve-out statements of operations prepared by Purchaser for the Business for the respective period, in accordance with GAAP, as defined in paragraph 2065.3 of the SEC Financial Reporting Manual in respect of "Carve-Out Financial Statements", excluding any allocations of general corporate expenses from Silicom Ltd.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.18&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#8220;Ceased to Provide Services&#8221;
</FONT>
	means resignation, or termination of employment or services to the Purchaser for cause, but excluding death, disability and terminating employment or services for reasons other than cause. For the purposes of this definition, the following reasons shall be deemed to constitute cause: (i) conviction of, or plea of nolo contendere to, a felony;&#160;&#160;(ii) failure to perform the duties of the employee&#8217;s position, as determined solely by the Purchaser; (iii) material and persistent neglect of duty other than by reason of illness or injury; (iv) engaging in conduct that violates the Purchaser&#8217;s code of conduct or other policies; (v) engaging in any willful act or omission outside the ordinary course of your duties as an employee which injures or could reasonably be expected to injure the financial condition or business reputation of the Purchaser; (vi) engaging, in connection with your services for the Purchaser, in material misconduct or material neglect (including, without limitation, fraud, dishonesty, misappropriation, embezzlement or gross neglect); and (vii) breach of any agreement with the Purchaser, including but not limited to the Non-Competition/Confidentiality/Assignment of IP Rights Agreement that you sign as a condition of your employment with the Purchaser.&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
	&#160;
</DIV>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">

</FONT>
	means: (1) all Seller or Selling Shareholder Liabilities relating to change of control payments or other similar fees or costs required to be paid as a result of the consummation of the transactions contemplated by the Agreement or in connection with obtaining any third party consents required under this Agreement or in connection with the transactions underlying this Agreement, and (2) payments to Wells Fargo Bank, National Association, Jeff Pompeo and Avnet from the Purchaser at closing in order to pay off the Indebtedness referenced in their payoff letters under Section 3.2(e)(iii).
</FONT>
</DIV>

	1.28&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#8220;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Contamination
</FONT>
	&#8221; shall mean any hazardous material, chemical, gas, liquid, waste, effluent, pollutant or contaminant which is present in the soil, groundwater, surface water, air or building materials of a property in a concentration that (i) exceeds the concentration allowed by applicable Environmental Laws and/or (ii) poses a serious threat to human health, safety or welfare or the environment.
</FONT>

<A NAME="eolPage176"></A>
<DIV ID="HDR">
<DIV ID="GLHDR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.29&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#8220;Damages&#8221;
</FONT>
	means any direct or indirect loss, damage, injury, decline in value, lost opportunity, Liability, claim, demand, settlement, judgment, award, fine, penalty, Tax, fee (including reasonable attorneys&#8217; fees), charge, cost (including costs of investigation) or expense of any nature.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.30&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#8220;Disclosure Schedule&#8221;
</FONT>
	means the schedule (dated as of the date of the Agreement) prepared in accordance with
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#8206;
</FONT>
	Article&#160;IV, delivered to Purchaser on behalf of the Seller and the Selling Shareholders.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.31&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#8220;Earn-Out Consideration&#8221;
</FONT>
	shall have the meaning ascribed to such term in Section
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#8206;
</FONT>
	2.2(b).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.32&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#8220;EBITDA Margin&#8221;
</FONT>
	means with respect to any fiscal year, (i) operating income excluding depreciation and amortization, divided by (ii) Revenues. The EBITDA Margin will be calculated on the basis of the Carve-Out Statements of Operations for the respective periods.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.39&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#8220;Environment&#8221;
</FONT>
	. &#8220;
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	Environment
</FONT>
	&#8221;
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#160;
</FONT>
	includes (a) any and all buildings, structures, fixtures, fittings, appurtenances, pipes, conduits, valves, tanks, vessels and containers whether above or below ground level, and (b) ambient air, land surface, sub-surface strata, soil, surface water, ground water, river sediment, marshes, wet lands, flora and fauna.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.40&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#8220;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Environmental Law
</FONT>
	&#8221; means any and all applicable Legal Requirements relating to the Environment which regulate (i) air, water and soil contamination, (ii) level of noise, vibration or odor, (iii) hazardous chemical substances, and (iv) protection of the Environment or of human health or safety or welfare or to the manufacture, formulation, processing, treatment, storage, containment, labeling, handling, transportation, distribution, recycling, reuse, release, disposal, removal, remediation, abatement or clean-up of any Contamination, all as amended as of the date hereof.
</FONT>
</DIV>

	1.41&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#8220;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Environmental Matter
</FONT>
	&#8221; means with respect to the Business, any matter relating to compliance with Environmental Laws, Contamination or compliance with Environmental Permits.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.42&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#8220;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Environmental Permit
</FONT>
	&#8221; means any material permit, license or authorization issued by a Governmental Body required by Environmental Laws for the operation of the Business.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.43&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#8220;Environmental Release&#8221;
</FONT>
	means the spilling, leaking, pumping, pouring, emitting, releasing, emptying, discharging, injecting, escaping, leaching, dumping, leaving, discarding or disposing of any Contamination into or upon the Environment.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.44&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#8220;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Excluded Assets

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#8206;
</FONT>
	2.4(b).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.45&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#8220;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Excluded Employee Liabilities
</FONT>
	&#8221; means all Liabilities with respect to the Transferred Employees, including all Liabilities arising under any employee benefits plans, including (i) for wages due and owing to the Transferred Employees for work performed until the Closing, (ii) for benefits that are due and owing to the Transferred Employees at or prior to the Closing, (iii) any amounts with respect to the retirement allowance plans, severance, pensions, medical or any other amounts that have accrued but are not due and owing as of the Closing), (iv) for employment taxes related to such wages and benefits which are required to be paid under applicable Legal Requirements, (v) for any benefits due under the Seller phantom stock plan, and (vi) all other Liabilities arising as a result of the failure by Seller and others to comply with the Legal&#160;&#160;Requirements surrounding the employment of the Transferred Employees by Seller prior to Closing.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#8206;

	2.4(d).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.47&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#8220;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	GAAP
</FONT>
	&#8221; means accounting principles generally acceptable in the United States of America applied in a manner consistent with the relevant company&#8217;s regular accounting policies.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.48&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#8220;Governmental Authorization&#8221;
</FONT>
	means any: (a) permit, license, certificate, franchise, permission, clearance, registration, qualification or authorization issued, granted, given or otherwise made available by or under the authority of any Governmental Body or pursuant to any Legal Requirement; or (b) right under any contract with any Governmental Body.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.49&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#8220;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Governmental Body
</FONT>
	&#8221; shall mean any: (a) nation, state, commonwealth, province, territory, county, municipality, district or other jurisdiction of any nature; (b) federal, state, local, municipal, foreign or other government; or (c) governmental or quasi-governmental authority of any nature (including any governmental division, department, agency, commission, instrumentality, official, organization, unit, body or Person and any court or other tribunal).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.50&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#8220;Governmental Grant&#8221;
</FONT>
	means any grant, incentive, subsidy, award, participation, exemption, status, cost sharing arrangement, reimbursement arrangement or other benefit, relief or privilege provided or made available by or on behalf of or under the authority of any Governmental Body.
</FONT>
</DIV>

	&#160;

<DIV ID="HDR">
<DIV ID="GLHDR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.51&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#8220;Indebtedness&#8221;
</FONT>
	means without duplication: (a) all obligations (including the principal amount thereof or, if applicable, the accreted amount thereof and the amount of accrued and unpaid interest thereon), whether or not represented by bonds, debentures, notes or other securities (whether or not convertible into any other security), for the repayment of money borrowed, whether owing to banks or other financial institutions, on equipment leases or otherwise; (b) all deferred indebtedness for the payment of the purchase price of property or assets purchased (other than accounts payable incurred in the ordinary course of business); (c) all obligations to pay rent or other amounts under a lease which is required to be classified as a capital lease on the face of a balance sheet prepared in accordance with GAAP; (d) all outstanding reimbursement obligations with respect to letters of credit, bankers&#8217; acceptances or similar facilities; (e) all obligations under any interest rate swap agreement, forward rate agreement, interest rate cap or collar agreement or other financial agreement or arrangement entered into for the purpose of limiting or managing interest rate risks; (f) all obligations secured by any Encumbrance existing on property, whether or not indebtedness secured thereby will have been assumed; (g) all guaranties, endorsements, assumptions and other contingent obligations in respect of, or to purchase or to otherwise acquire, indebtedness of others; (h) all premiums, penalties, fees, expenses, breakage costs and change of control payments required to be paid or offered in respect of any of the foregoing on prepayment, as a result of the consummation of the transactions contemplated by the Agreement or in connection with any lender consent; and (i) all obligations, whether interest bearing or otherwise, owed to any security holder of and/or any Affiliate of any security holder.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.52&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#8220;Indemnitees&#8221;
</FONT>
	means the following Persons: (a) Purchaser; (b) Purchaser&#8217;s current and future Affiliates; (c) the respective Representatives of the Persons referred to in clauses &#8220;(a)&#8221; and &#8220;(b)&#8221; above; and (d) the respective successors and assigns of the Persons referred to in clauses &#8220;(a),&#8221; &#8220;(b)&#8221; and &#8220;(c)&#8221; above.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.53&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#8220;Intellectual Property&#8221;
</FONT>
	means algorithms, APIs, databases, data collections, diagrams, formulae, inventions (whether or not patentable), know-how, logos, marks (including brand names, product names, logos, and slogans), methods, network configurations and architectures, processes, proprietary information, protocols, schematics, PCB files, product designs, BOM documentation, testing program and procedures, FPGA files, specifications, software, firmware, software code (in any form, including source code and executable or object code), subroutines, techniques, user interfaces, URLs, websites, works of authorship and other forms of technology (whether or not embodied in any tangible form and including all tangible embodiments of the foregoing, such as instruction manuals, laboratory notebooks, prototypes, samples, studies and summaries).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.54&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#8220;Intellectual Property Rights&#8221;
</FONT>
	means all rights of the following types, which may exist or be created under the laws of any jurisdiction in the world: (A) rights associated with works of authorship, including exclusive exploitation rights, copyrights, moral rights and mask works; (B) trademark and trade name rights and similar rights; (C) trade secret rights; (D) patent and industrial property rights; (E) other proprietary rights in Intellectual Property; and (F) rights in or relating to registrations, renewals, extensions, combinations, divisions, and reissues of, and applications for, any of the rights referred to in clauses &#8220;(A)&#8221; through &#8220;(E)&#8221; above.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV ID="PGBRK" STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<DIV ID="FTR">
<DIV ID="GLFTR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="LEFT">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.55&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#8220;Interim Balance Sheets&#8221;
</FONT>
	means the solo balance sheets and the statements of income of the Seller prepared by management of the Seller in accordance with GAAP as of the date hereof and as of the Closing Date.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.56&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#8220;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Inventory
</FONT>
	&#8221; means all inventory, primarily used or held for use by the Seller in the Business, as of the Closing Date.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.57&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#8220;Joint Products&#8221;
</FONT>
	means products and services developed by Purchaser which include use of the Sold Assets and specifically the use of Transferred Employees, which will incorporate both the Purchaser's Intellectual Property Rights and Seller IP. Notwithstanding the aforementioned, products which incorporate Seller IP as a result of such Seller IP being provided by third party in connection with the use of its products which were purchased by Purchaser with no connection to the acquisition of the Business (such as Intel related reference designs) shall not be deemed to incorporate Seller IP for that reason alone. Any determination of whether a product is a Joint Product shall be made by mutual agreement of Steve Yates and Shaike Orbach on an individual case by case basis prior to starting development on such product.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

	4.10(a).
</FONT>

</FONT>
	hereof.

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.61&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#8220;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Legal Proceeding
</FONT>
	&#8221; means any action, suit, litigation, arbitration, proceeding (including any civil, criminal, administrative, investigative or appellate proceeding), hearing, inquiry, audit, examination or investigation commenced, brought, conducted or heard by or before, or otherwise involving, any court or other Governmental Body or any arbitrator or arbitration panel.
</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">

</FONT>
	means any federal, state, local, municipal, foreign (including Israeli and United States, as applicable) or other law, statute, constitution, principle of common law, resolution, ordinance, code, edict, decree, rule, regulation, ruling or requirement issued, enacted, adopted, promulgated, implemented or otherwise put into effect by or under the authority of any Governmental Body.
</FONT>
</DIV>

	&#160;

<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">

</FONT>
	&#8221; means, with respect to any Person, any liability, debt, duty or obligation of such Person of any kind, character or description, whether known or unknown, absolute or contingent, asserted or unasserted, accrued or unaccrued, liquidated or unliquidated, secured or unsecured, joint or several, due or to become due, vested or unvested, executory, determined, determinable or otherwise and whether or not the same is required to be accrued on the financial statements of such Person.
</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.66&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#8220;Made Available to Purchaser&#8221;
</FONT>
	. Any statement made herein to the effect that any information, document or other material has been &#8220;
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	Made Available to Purchaser
</FONT>
	&#8221; shall mean that such information, document or material was made available for review by Purchaser or Purchaser&#8217;s Representatives for a reasonable period of time prior to the date of the Agreement in the electronic data room organized by the Seller in connection with the due diligence investigation conducted by Purchaser (it being understood that a &#8220;
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	reasonable period of time
</FONT>
	&#8221; shall mean a period of time sufficient to allow Purchaser or Purchaser&#8217;s Representatives to have access to such information, document or material after Purchaser or its Representatives were advised of the availability of such information, document or material for review in the data room) and that such information, document or other material was accurate and did not contain an omission of material facts.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.67&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#8220;Material Adverse Effect&#8221;
</FONT>
	means any change, event, effect, claim, circumstance or matter (each, an &#8220;
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	Effect
</FONT>
	&#8221;) that is, or could reasonably be expected to be or to become, materially adverse to: (a) the business, condition, assets, capitalization, Intellectual Property Rights, Liabilities, operations, results of operations or financial performance of the Seller; (b) Purchaser&#8217;s right to own and make use of the Sold Assets and operate the Business; or (c) the ability of the Seller and the Selling Shareholders to perform any of their covenants or obligations under this Agreement or under any other contract or instrument executed, delivered or entered into in connection with any of the transactions contemplated by this Agreement.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>

	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;

	means the material customers of the Seller with whom the Seller has a commercial relationship but for which there are currently no framework or other agreements in place, including customers who purchase products and services from time to time through purchase orders. A list of the Material Customers is set forth on
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	Schedule
</FONT>

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.74&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#8220;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Person
</FONT>
	&#8221; means any individual, corporation, partnership, firm, association, joint venture, joint stock company, trust, unincorporated organization or other entity, including any Governmental Body.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.75&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#8220;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Pre-Closing Period
</FONT>
	&#8221; means the period from the date of this Agreement and continuing until the earlier of the termination of this Agreement or the Closing.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.76&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#8220;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Premises
</FONT>
	&#8221; means the property and buildings located at 1758 Worth Park # A, Charlottesville, VA 22911, USA.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.77&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#8220;Registered IP&#8221;
</FONT>
	means all Seller IP that is registered, filed, or issued under the authority of, with or by any Governmental Body, including all patents, registered copyrights and registered trademarks and all applications for any of the foregoing.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.78&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#8220;Related Party&#8221;
</FONT>
	means: (a) each Selling Shareholder and their Affiliates (excluding the Seller); (b) each individual who is or who has been at any time since inception of the Seller, an officer or director of the Seller; (c) each member of the immediate family of each of the individuals referred to in clauses &#8220;(a)&#8221; and &#8220;(b)&#8221; above; (d) any trust or other Person (other than the Seller) in which any one of the Persons referred to in clauses &#8220;(a)&#8221; &#8220;(b)&#8221; and &#8220;(c)&#8221; above holds (or in which more than one of such Persons collectively hold), beneficially or otherwise, a material voting, proprietary or equity interest.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">

	1.79&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">

</FONT>
	means officers, directors, employees, agents, attorneys, accountants, advisors and representatives.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">

</FONT>
	means cash proceeds received (during the applicable period and thereafter until April 15
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 70%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP">
	th
</FONT>
	of the following year) from Sales made during the applicable period,
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	provided however
</FONT>
	, that for the purposes hereof, solely with respect to cash proceeds generated from sales of Joint Products, such cash proceeds will be multiplied by a percentage representing the Sold Asset&#8217;s contribution to such specific Joint Product as shall be mutually agreed upon by Steve Yates and Shaike Orbach on an individual case by case basis.
</FONT>
</DIV>

</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.90&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#8220;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Transferred Employee
</FONT>
	&#8221; means the Business Employees who will be terminated from their employment with Seller at Closing and will become employees of the Purchaser pursuant to new employment agreements at Closing.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

</FONT>
	&#8221; means all the contracts to be entered into between the Purchaser and any of the Transferred Employees in respect of their employment at Closing.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.92&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#8220;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">

</FONT>
	&#8221; means all Liabilities with respect to the Transferred Employees pursuant to the Transferred Employee Contracts and excluding the Excluded Employee Liabilities.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.93&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#8220;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Transferred Employee Records
</FONT>
	&#8221; means (subject to applicable privacy laws and with such Transferred Employee&#8217;s consent where legally required) copies of the electronic employment data relating to the Transferred Employees and copies of all paper personnel files related to the Transferred Employees.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.94&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	General Terms
</FONT>
	- the definitions in Article I shall apply equally to both the singular and plural forms of the terms defined. The words &#8220;include&#8221;, &#8220;includes&#8221; and &#8220;including&#8221; shall be deemed to be followed by the phrase &#8220;without limitation&#8221;. The use of the word &#8220;or&#8221; shall not be exclusive. The word "Agreement" shall include all schedules and exhibits hereto unless the context otherwise requires. The words &#8220;herein&#8221;, &#8220;hereof&#8221; and &#8220;hereunder&#8221; and words of similar import refer to this Agreement (including the Exhibits and Schedules to this Agreement) in its entirety and not to any part hereof unless the context shall otherwise require. All references herein to Sections, Exhibits and Schedules shall be deemed references to Sections of, and Exhibits and Schedules to, this Agreement unless the context shall otherwise require. Any reference in this Agreement to a &#8220;day&#8221; or a number of &#8220;days&#8221; (without explicit reference to &#8220;Business Days&#8221;) shall be interpreted as a reference to a calendar day or number of calendar days.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.95&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Ambiguity
</FONT>
	- In the event an ambiguity or question of intent or interpretation arises, in any judicial proceeding or otherwise, the terms of this Agreement shall be construed as having been drafted jointly by the parties, and no presumption, burden of proof nor other rule of construction, shall arise favoring or disfavoring any party with respect to resolution of ambiguities by virtue of the authorship of any provisions of this Agreement.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.96&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Currency
</FONT>
	- All references in this Agreement to "$US" or &#8220;dollars&#8221; or &#8220;$&#8221; shall mean United States Dollars.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV ID="PGBRK" STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<DIV ID="FTR">
<DIV ID="GLFTR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV ID="PN" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS; WIDTH: 100%">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; WIDTH: 100%">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	- 12 -
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; WIDTH: 100%">
<HR STYLE="COLOR: BLACK" NOSHADE SIZE="3">
</DIV>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage184"></A>
<DIV ID="HDR">
<DIV ID="GLHDR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	ART
<A NAME="EXHIBIT_4-7_HTM_A13">
	IC
</A>
	LE&#160;II
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	THE TRANSACTION
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	2.1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#160;&#160;&#160; &#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	The Transaction
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 72PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Effective as of the Closing, and upon the terms and subject to the conditions of this Agreement, the Seller shall convey, assign, transfer and deliver to Purchaser (directly and/or through its Affiliate, Silicom Inc.), and Purchaser shall assume and acquire from the Seller, all of Seller&#8217;s right, title and interest in and to the Sold Assets, free and clear of any Encumbrances, in exchange for: (i)&#160;the Closing Consideration, (ii) the Earn-Out Consideration, and (iii) the assumption by the Purchaser of the Assumed Liabilities.&#160;&#160;To the extent Seller does not have the power or right, either by contract, by statute or at common law unilaterally to assign, transfer or delegate contracts, software, covenants, permits, licenses, assets or Intellectual Property to the Purchaser (the "
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Transfer Restricted Assets
</FONT>
	"), and without in any way limiting the conditions precedent to the obligations of the Purchaser set forth in Section
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#8206;
</FONT>
	3.2, the Seller shall use best efforts to obtain the consent of the relevant customer, clients, licensor, governmental entity or other party to the Transfer Restricted Assets being sold or transferred, but shall not be liable or responsible or suffer any decrease&#160;&#160;or reduction of the Closing Consideration or Earn-Out consideration paid or payable under this Agreement as the direct result of such inability to assign, transfer, or delegate the relevant Transfer Restricted Assets.&#160;&#160;The Parties agree and acknowledge that the effect of any such obstacles to transfer or assignment of the Transfer Restricted Assets will be accounted for by the subsequent operating results and by their resultant effect on the Earn-Out Consideration.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 72PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;All of the assets assumed and acquired by the Purchaser from the Seller shall be assumed and acquired by Silicom Ltd., except as expressly stated otherwise.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	2.2&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#160; &#160;&#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	Consideration
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 72PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	Closing Consideration
</FONT>
	. At and subject to the Closing, the Purchaser, jointly and severally, shall pay the Closing Consideration to the Seller. The Closing Consideration shall be paid in cash by wire transfer into the account to be provided to the Purchaser at least three Business Days prior to the Closing Date.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 72PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	Earn-Out Payments
</FONT>
	. As further consideration pursuant to Section
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#8206;
</FONT>
	2.1, following the Closing the Seller shall be eligible to the following payments (together, the &#8220;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Earn-Out Consideration
</FONT>
	&#8221;):
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 126PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(i)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;if the Revenues during the period between Closing and December 31, 2015 exceed $2,250,000, then the Seller shall be eligible to collectively receive an aggregate payment equal to $3,000,000 (the &#8220;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	2015 Excess Payment
</FONT>
	&#8221;). The 2015 Excess Payment will be paid in cash by wire transfer into the account set forth in Section
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#8206;
</FONT>
	2.2
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#8206;
</FONT>
	(a) above, within 30 days of publication of the Purchaser&#8217;s audited financial statements for the year ended December 31, 2015;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 126PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(ii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;if the Revenues during the 2016 calendar year exceed $9,000,000 (such excess amount, the
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#8220;2016 Excess Amount&#8221;
</FONT>
	), then, subject to the EBITDA Margin for the 2016 calendar year (as derived from the Purchaser&#8217;s financial statements) being equal to or higher than 16%, the Seller shall be eligible to collectively receive an aggregate payment equal to twice the 2016 Excess Amount (the
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#8220;2016 Excess Payment&#8221;
</FONT>
	). 50% of the 2016 Excess Payment will be paid in cash by wire transfer into the account set forth in Section
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#8206;
</FONT>
	2.2
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#8206;
</FONT>
	(a) above within 30 days of publication of the Purchaser&#8217;s audited financial statements for the year ended December 31, 2016. The remaining 50% of the 2016 Excess Payment will be paid to the Seller by way of a grant of ordinary shares of Silicom Ltd. (valued based on the average fair market value of such shares during 90 days before the date of grant) within 60 days of publication of the Purchaser&#8217;s audited financial statements for the year ended December 31, 2016 directly to the Seller.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV ID="PGBRK" STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<DIV ID="FTR">
<DIV ID="GLFTR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV ID="PN" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS; WIDTH: 100%">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; WIDTH: 100%">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	- 13 -
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; WIDTH: 100%">
<HR STYLE="COLOR: BLACK" NOSHADE SIZE="3">
</DIV>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage185"></A>
<DIV ID="HDR">
<DIV ID="GLHDR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 126PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(iii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;if the Revenues during the 2017 calendar year exceed the greater of (A) $9,000,000 and (B) the Company&#8217;s Revenues during the 2016 calendar year (such excess amount, the
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#8220;2017 Excess Amount&#8221;
</FONT>
	), then, subject to the EBITDA Margin for the 2017 calendar year (as derived from the Purchaser&#8217;s financial statements) being equal to or higher than 16%, the Seller shall be eligible to collectively receive an aggregate payment equal to the 2017 Excess Amount multiplied by 1.5 (the
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#8220;2017 Excess Payment&#8221;
</FONT>
	). 50% of the 2017 Excess Payment will be paid in cash by wire transfer into the account set forth in Section
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#8206;
</FONT>
	2.2
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#8206;
</FONT>
	(a) within 30 days of the publication of the Purchaser&#8217;s audited financial statements for the year ended December 31, 2017. The remaining 50% of the 2017 Excess Payment will be paid to the Seller by way of a grant of ordinary shares of Silicom Ltd. (valued based on the average fair market value of such shares during 90 days before the date of grant) within 60 days of the publication of the Purchaser&#8217;s audited financial statements for the year ended December 31, 2017 directly to the Seller;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 126PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(iv)&#160;&#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	Lock-Up.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	During the period commencing on the date of the grant of shares in accordance with Section
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#8206;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	2.2(b) of this Agreement, as applicable,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	and ending on the One Hundred and Eighty-First (181
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 70%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP">
	st
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	)&#160;day following such date (such period is referred to herein as the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Lock-Up Period
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	&#8221;), the Seller
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	shall not (a)&#160;
</FONT>
	sell
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	, transfer, assign, offer, pledge, contract to sell, transfer or assign, sell any option or contract to purchase, purchase any option or contract to sell, transfer or assign, grant any option, right or warrant to purchase, or otherwise transfer, assign or dispose of, directly or indirectly, any of such shares (the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Locked-Up Securities
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	&#8221;), (b)&#160;enter into any swap or other arrangement that transfers or assigns to another person or entity, in whole or in part, any of the economic benefits, obligations or other consequences of any nature of ownership of the Locked-Up Securities, whether any such transaction is to be settled by delivery of the Locked-Up Securities in cash or otherwise, or (c)&#160;engage in any short selling of the Locked-Up Securities. Notwithstanding the restrictions set forth in this Section
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#8206;
</FONT>
	2.2(b)(iv)
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	, during the Lock-Up Period the Seller shall be permitted to transfer Locked-Up Securities to the persons listed on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	Exhibit A
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	, provided that such transferred Locked-Up Securities will continue to be subject to the Lock-Up Period, and, if requested by the Purchaser,&#160;any such transferee signs a written instrument satisfactory to the Purchaser in its sole discretion evidencing such transferee&#8217;s agreement to be bound by the provisions of this Agreement with respect to the Locked-Up Securities so transferred. The Seller acknowledges and agrees that the Locked-Up Securities may bear a restrictive legend evidencing the lock-up restrictions described herein.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	Seller
</FONT>
	hereby authorizes the Purchaser during the relevant Lock-Up Period to cause any transfer agent for the
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	Locked-Up Securities
</FONT>
	to decline to transfer, and to note stop transfer restrictions on the stock register and other records relating to the
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	Locked-Up Securities
</FONT>
	subject to the Lock-Up Period, if such transfer would constitute a violation or breach of this Agreement.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
